channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: US airlines cancel 1,000 flights while complying with shutdown order
item.description: Anxious travelers across the U.S. are feeling a bit of relief as airlines have mostly stayed on schedule while gradually cutting flights because of the government shutdown.

item.title: Trump administration asks Supreme Court to halt order providing full SNAP payments for November
Judge rules Trump administration failed to meet legal requirements for deploying troops to Portland
